page.title: 14My Mum
page.content: My name is Mark Ketchell. My Mum works at Sibton Park School and she is a dinner lady. I live in Church Cottage. My Mum goes to work at 8.30am. When she goes to work she asks the chef what is for dinner so that she knows what to put on the table. She lays the tables and serves the dinner. The girls have dinner at 1pm and finish at about 2pm. Then they start work again. My Mum does the washing up. Sometimes the machine breaks down and my Mum has to wash by hand, and that is hard because there is lots of washing up. Then she washes the pans and cleans the kitchen. When she has finished she has her dinner. At about 3pm she goes home.
